concept.title: 5223.506 Suspension of payments, termination of contract, and debarment and suspension actions.

conbody.p: (e) Submit requests for waiver to SECNAV via the HCA and DASN(P) by email at RDAJ&As.fct@navy.mil with the subject “[Activity Name] FAR 23.506 – Contractor Drug-Free Workplace Violation Contract Award Waiver Request.”.
